Tooltip.changelog: Optimize z-index logic of Tooltip.
🆕 Tooltip adds `fresh` attribute to support scenarios where content still needs to be updated when closed.

🐞 Adjust Tooltip & Popover display logic. Now the first priority is to ensure that it will not be clipped by `overflow: hidden`, and the second is to ensure that it is displayed within the viewport as much as possible.
💄 Adjust Tooltip motion that will auto detect best match transform origin.

🐞 Fix Modal hooks not pass ConfigProvider config correctly.
🐞 Fix ConfigProvider that `componentDisabled` is not work.

🆕 ColorPicker now supports `defaultFormat`.
🐞 Fix ColorPicker popup still working when `disabled` is `true`.
🐞 Fix ColorPicker duplicate `key` issue.
🐞 Fix the cursor jumps when entering lowercase English letters in the ColorPicker color value input box.
🐞 Fix the ColorPicker style is deformed under different sizes.
🆕 ColorPicker support `disabledAlpha` prop.
🐞 Fix ColorPicker not calling `onChangeComplete` callback when changing value.
🐞 Fix ColorPicker that status style is missing inside Form.Item.
🆕 ColorPicker support `showText` prop.
🆕 ColorPicker support `destroyTooltipOnHide` prop.
🆕 ColorPicker support `onChangeComplete` prop.
🆕 ColorPicker support `panelRender` prop.
🆕 ColorPicker support `size` prop.

🐞 Fix ColorPicker that should not trigger `onChange` when click clear after clearing.
🆕 ColorPicker add `onClear` and dont't close panel when clearing.
💄 Optimize ColorPicker style in dark theme.
🐞 Fix ColorPicker hover boundary issue.
💄 Fix ColorPicker style in RTL mode.
🐞 Optimize ColorPicker the `allowClear` interaction logic, reopening the panel to select a color will default to 100% transparency instead of 0%.
🐞 Optimize ColorPicker interaction. Now it will close panel when click clear button.
🔥 New Component ColorPicker.
🆕 Global: Fill rest `rootClassName` for all components.

Collapse.changelog: 🐞 Fix Collapse that displayed unexpected deprecated warning.
🤖 Fix Collapse's `items` type should be optional.
🆕 Collapse `items` to support configure panel content.

🆕 Add ref for Collapse and Panel.
🆕 Global: Fill rest `rootClassName` for all components.

Checkbox.changelog: 💄 Fix Tree that Checkbox should be aligned with first line.
🐞 Fix Checkbox & Radio not support customize wave and add className `ant-wave-target` for this case.
🐞 Fix Checkbox both set `checked` and `indeterminate` prop will not show as `indeterminate` style.
🤖 Replaced `ref` type with `CheckboxRef` instead of `unknown` for Checkbox.
💄 keep Checkbox.Group style the same as v4.
🐞 Fix Checkbox that title do not align.
🛠 Refactor Checkbox with hooks and new types.
🐞 Fix Checkbox with customize `controlHeight` token not align in center with text.
🐞 Fixed inconsistency between Checkbox and Radio in table when Form is `disabled`.
🐞 Fix Radio/Checkbox under Form `disabled` property don't works correctly.
🆕 Global: Fill rest `rootClassName` for all components.
🐞 Fix Checkbox that label not aligned with checkbox.
🐞 Fix Transfer Checkbox not disabled when itemsLits is empty.
🐞 Fix Checkbox not support Tooltip or Popover when it is `disabled`.

Cascader.changelog: Optimize z-index logic of Cascader, TreeSelect and AutoComplete.
💄 Revert outline style of Input, InputNumber, Select, Cascader, TreeSelect, DatePicker, TimePicker, ColorPicker.
🔥 Update the active styles of Input, InputNumber, Select, Cascader, TreeSelect, DatePicker, and ColorPicker.
🆕 Cascader supports the Cascader.Panel component for inline use.
💄 Fix Select/Cascader/TreeSelect style issue when customize their height.
🆕 Cascader component now supports `autoClearSearchValue` option.
🛠 Alert, Tree, Cascader, Layout, Table, Modal, Drawer, Button, Switch, Select, Badge, Form, TimePicker, Spin, Input, Progress, Divider Added Component Token.
🐞 Fix Select, TreeSelect, Cascader, DatePicker unexpected warning of deprecated `clearIcon`
🆕 AutoComplete/Cascader/DatePicker/Input.Textarea/TimePicker/TreeSelect support `allowClear` prop to customize clear button.
🗑 Select, Tree-Select and Cascader deprecated `showArrow` prop. Now suffix arrow should be configured with `suffixIcon`.
🤖 Improve Cascader, ConfigProvider, DatePicker, InputNumber, Slider and Upload definitions.
🤖 Transparently pass Cascader `optionType` generic.
💄 Optimize the style of Select, TreeSelect, Cascader multi-selection mode, remove the Tag border.
🆕 Cascader `options` support `disableCheckbox` prop.
💄 Optimize Select-like component popup logic (e.g. Select, TreeSelect, Cascader). Now always try to display it in the visible area first to reduce the user's extra scrolling cost.
🐞 Fix Cascader sub panel not close when hover to leaf node.
💄 Fix Select, TreeSelect, Cascader popup align position not correct when parent has `transform: scale` style.
💄 Adjust Select, TreeSelect, Cascader always show the `arrow` by default when multiple.
🤖 Fix Cascader that generics should not be necessary.
🆕 Global: Fill rest `rootClassName` for all components.
🐞 Fix Cascader dropdown `placement` in RTL mode.
🐞 Fix Cascader `notFoundContent` cannot be clicked.
💄 Fix Cascader ul has unexpected margin value.

🐞 Fix the issue of vertical dragging malfunction in Carousel.
🐞 Fix Carousel do not support `id` prop.

💄 Fix Card that Card.Grid has wrong style with left bottom corner.

💄 Fix Card radius style broken when customize `bodyStyle` background color.

Calendar.changelog: 🆕 Calendar support passing `panelMode` as the select source type to the internal select trigger callback to use the correct source type when called.
🆕 Calendar `onSelect` support `info.source` param to help get select source.
🆕 Add `DatePicker.generateCalendar` and `Calendar.generateCalendar` custom date component method, no need to import from module path.
🆕 DatePicker/TimePicker/Calendar could change date-library to luxon now.

🆕 DatePicker/Calendar add `cellRender` for custom cells and deprecated properties `dateRender` and `monthCellRender` in DatePicker, deprecated properties `dateCellRender`、`monthCellRender`、`dateFullCellRender`、`monthFullCellRender` in Calendar.
🆕 Global: Fill rest `rootClassName` for all components.
🛠 Refactor Affix Calendar to use React.createRef instead of function.

🐞 Fix Button that does not display loading status when `loading` property is set to `{ delay: 0 }`.
🐞 Fix Button that two Chinese characters in nested span should have space between.
🐞 Fix Button unexpected loading icon when conditional rendering.
🆕 Button component has added three component tokens: `contentFontSize`, `contentFontSizeSM`, and `contentFontSizeLG`, allowing customization of font sizes for different sizes.
🐞 Fixed the issue where `fontSizeSM` token was not being applied to Button component.
🛠 Alert, Tree, Cascader, Layout, Table, Modal, Drawer, Button, Switch, Select, Badge, Form, TimePicker, Spin, Input, Progress, Divider Added Component Token.
🛠 Extract Button compact style, now only the corresponding style will be generated when Space.Compact is used.
🐞 Fix Button missing part `React.ButtonHTMLAttributes` issue.
🤖 Button `ref` type optimization.
🐞 Fix Button `onClick` missing `event` definition.

🐞 Fix Button disabled style is missing when use with the deprecated usage of `type="ghost"`.
🤖 Improve Button definitions.

💄 Fix Button disabled style error when it has `link` or `href` attribute.
🤖 Remove redundant number type from Button `loading`.
🤖 Improve Button `target` property type definition.
🐞 Fix Button with `disabled` still can interactive with sub component.
🆕 ConfigProvider support configuring Button `style` / `className` / `styles` / `classNames`.
🐞 Fix wrong Button icon size and margin.
🐞 Fix Button type to support custom data attributes.

🐞 Fix Button `loading.delay` not delay at first time.
🆕 Global: Fill rest `rootClassName` for all components.
🐞 Fix Button text color when containing an `a` tag.
🐞 Fix Button wave effect sometime makes layout shaking.
🐞 Fix Button wave effect not following screen scroll.
🐞 Fix Button `block` props not work.
🐞 Fix disabled style miss when has href on Button.
🤖 Optimize Button DropDown Modal Popconfirm Select Transfer mouse event type definition.
💄 Optimize Button style under Space.Compact.
🐞 Fix Button `block` prop is not working when `shape="round"`.

Breadcrumb.changelog: 🤖 Optimize Breadcrumb `params` type and support generics.
🤖 Optimize Breadcrumb `params` type and support generics.
